description: A React component for a device form that handles creation and editing of device entries with client-side validation, including form state management, validation logic, and API interactions.

methods.name: setField
methods.description: Updates the form state for a specific field.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Performs client-side validation of form fields.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, including API calls and error handling.
